text: Kananjalo nguYe Othumela imimoya ukuba ibe zizandulela zeendaba ezivuyisayo, (le mimoya) ihambe phambi kweNceba yaKhe de ithwale ilifu lemvula Thina Siyiqhubele emhlabeni ofileyo Senze amanzi ehle phezu kwawo. Sivelise ngawo zonke iintlobo zeziqhamo. Kanye ngolo hlobo ke, Siya kubavusa abafileyo, khonâ€™ukuze nikhumbule kungenjalo (nihlale) nilumkile
